name: 曾德樟

6. Frequency-Shift Keying (FSK) System

(3). Receiver (Demodulation)

6. Frequency-Shift Keying (FSK) System:(第十三週-第十四週)

(2). Receiver (Demodulation)

(1). Transmitter (Modulation)
(2). Receiver (Demodulation)

1.各項目之實驗結果。
